sources.title: GoryachayaTochkaflashpoint
sources.description: Goryachaya tochka The fighting officer, the veteran of war in Afghanistan, major Larin, should receive, at last, holiday after long service on frontier. However the next sortie of Mojaheds under leadership of the traitor has found it on an outpost. Not to pass home a caravan with drugs, Larin is ready to die... Director: Ivan Solovov Cast: Alexander Pankratov-Chorny, Vladimir Steklov, Igor Yankovsky, Ilona Belyaeva, Vyacheslav Kulakov. Mentor Cinema/Premier-film Russia, 1998
